objects.text:
• Elegant Pink Crystal Design
• Perfect Gift for Her
• Certificate of Authenticity

product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*

- Product Dimensions: 1.27 x 1.3 x 1.27 cm; 3.9 g.

banner_details:
This banner is a promotional jewelry ad split into two vertical halves with a soft pastel aesthetic. The left half contains layered informative text elements including a bold header (`heading`), subheading (`subheading`), product highlights (`description`), price (`price`), and a call-to-action button (`cta_button` and `cta`). The right half showcases an image of the featured product (`product_image`) with a subtle customer rating below (`rating`). The background has a flowing gradient with delicate circular and wave motifs, reinforcing a graceful and feminine tone.

**Color Palette:**
- Soft Rose: `#FFC0CB`
- Dusty Mauve: `#C06C84`
- Lilac Gray: `#6C5B7B`
- Deep Blue: `#355C7D`
- Cream Pink: `#FFF1F1`
- Light Blush: `#FFE4E1`
product_color: The product image showcases elegant earrings with a romantic and feminine color palette. Dominated by a soft rose gold (#E9A6A1), the metallic base complements the blush pink enamel teardrop shape (#F7C5CB), creating a gentle and luxurious tone. Clear crystals with high brilliance (#FFFFFF) are used generously, adding a sparkling contrast that highlights the delicate pink hues. The colors are smoothly blended, with the reflective crystals enhancing the shine and softness of the surrounding rose gold metal. This combination makes the palette suitable for an advertisement banner using Rose Gold (#E9A6A1), Blush Pink (#F7C5CB), and Crystal White (#FFFFFF) for a luxurious, feminine appeal.
